formula.name: Max

argument.name: set
argument.argument_description: A valid Multidimensional Expressions (MDX) expression that returns a set

argument.name: number
argument.argument_description: A valid numeric expression that is typically a Multidimensional Expressions (MDX) expression of cell coordinates that return a number.

formula.description: Returns the maximum value of a numeric expression that is evaluated over a set.

formula.name: LastPeriods

argument.name: index
argument.argument_description: A valid numeric expression that specifies a number of periods.

argument.name: argmember
argument.argument_description: A valid Multidimensional Expressions (MDX) expression that returns a member.

formula.description: Returns a set of members up to and including a specified member.

formula.name: ParallelPeriod

argument.name: arglevel
argument.argument_description: A valid Multidimensional Expressions (MDX) expression that returns a level.

argument.name: index
argument.argument_description: A valid numeric expression that specifies the number of parallel periods to lag.

argument.name: argmember
argument.argument_description: A valid Multidimensional Expressions (MDX) expression that returns a member.

formula.description: Returns a member from a prior period in the same relative position as a specified member.

formula.name: PeriodsToDate

argument.name: arglevel
argument.argument_description: A valid Multidimensional Expressions (MDX) expression that returns a level.

argument.name: argmember
argument.argument_description: A valid Multidimensional Expressions (MDX) expression that returns a member.

formula.description: Returns a set of sibling members from the same level as a given member, starting with the first sibling and ending with the given member, as constrained by a specified level in the Time dimension.

formula.name: OpeningPeriod

argument.name: arglevel
argument.argument_description: A valid Multidimensional Expressions (MDX) expression that returns a level.

argument.name: argmember
argument.argument_description: A valid Multidimensional Expressions (MDX) expression that returns a member.

formula.description: Returns the first sibling among the descendants of a specified level, optionally at a specified member.
